channel.title: Insertion Sort :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Video Script In these next couple of videos, weâ€™re going to introduce the concept of sorting algorithms. Sorting algorithms are used when we want to arrange sets of data in order either from smallest to largest or largest to smallest in our computer programs. As it turns out, there are many different ways that we can sort our data using different algorithms. And each of those algorithms have unique characteristics that make them suitable for certain types of data in certain situations.
